data.title: Celestial Prophecy & Sacred Serenity
data.text:
Discography:

Celestial Prophecy & Sacred Serenity – Sacred Prophecy (new demo in progress)

The Prophecy – “Fields Of The Cosmic Elements” – 5 track demo – 2000

(symphonic death/gothic metal)

The Prophecy – “Beyond The Infinity” – 4 track demo – 1999

(symphonic death/black/gothic metal)

Sacred Serenity – “Testament For The Wind” – 3 track demo – 2002

(symphonic/gothic metal)

Celestial Prophecy & Sacred Serenity – “A New Earth” – 12 track demos (2 demos) – 2010-2012

(symphonic metal, space metal, future pop, ambiental, eletronic music, score music, cyber metal)

https://www.box.com/s/6djxks4dp23l7b74qtc2

Celestial Prophecy & Sacred Serenity – 3 track promo – 2012

(symphonic metal, space metal, electro, ambient, future pop, score music, cyber metal)

Celestial Prophecy & Sacred Serenity – 5 track demo – 2010

(symphonic metal, space metal, electro, ambient, future pop, score music, cyber metal)

(CPASS – february 2013. Photo by: Darko Mareš)

(CPASS – march 2011. Photo by: Neven Đorđević)

Info:

This is sincere music without any trendy upheaval, without ego boosting and without “red bull” production!

Genre:

Combination of styles from symphonic metal, gothic metal, epic score music, electronics to space rock, synth pop and ambiental music

Bios:

Celestial Prophecy & Sacred Serenity is a band formed by keyboard player Dalibor Mladenovic(Neon Eyes, Elrond’s Gate, Nindza Brus li) from Varazdin(Croatia). The band was formed in 2010. on the foundations of Dalibors past bands The Prophecy(1998-2001, symphonic death/black/gothic metal) and Sacred Serenity(2001-2003, symphonic gothic metal) whose songs are performed regularly on live shows. It’s opus is a combination of styles from symphonic metal, gothic metal, electronics to space rock, synth pop and ambiental music.

Celestial Prophecy & Sacred Serenity line up 2014

Dalibor Mladenovic – music, keyboards, vocoder, lyrics, vocals, drum programming

Celestial Prophecy & Sacred Serenity line-up (2009 – 2014):

Dalibor Mladenovic – keyboards, music, lyrics, vocoder

Dario Klemencic – vocals

Tomislava Turcin – vocals (since 2012)

Fedra Pavelic – vocals (since 2012 back vocals)

Darko Mares – guitars

Jan Sohr – bass

Dominik Turkovic – drums

Guest musicians:

Lanzarot (Death Of Folk) – guitars, production

Vladimir Soldatek (Cold Snap) – guitars

Kora Pavelic – vocals

Gordan Vrbanec (Insolitvs) – guitars

Kresimir Susec – bass

Mate (Besthial) – guitars

Srecko Dikic – drums, drum programming

The Prophecy line up (1997-2001)

Dalibor Mladenovic – keyboard, music, lyrics

Igor Velimirovic – guitars, music on Quest For Metal

Tomislav Kovac – bass, music on Starshield and Quest For Metal, drum programming

Darko Mares – guitar, production

Goran Pofuk – vocals, partial lyrics on The Prophecy

Ante Klecina – drums

Jurica Santek – drums

Pimpa – drums

Sacred Serenity line up (2001 – 2003)

Dalibor Mladenovic – keyboards, music, lyrics, drum programming, production

Fedra Pavelic – vocals

Dominik Turkovic – drums

Darko Mares – bas, production, covers

Kora Pavelic – back vocals

Dario Poljak – guitars

Milos Rok – keyboards

Vinko – guitars

Mario Strlek – bas

(Photo by: Marta Budinski Mladenović)

Hometown, Country:

Varaždin, Croatia

Label Status:

happily unsigned

Influences:

mostly from golden 90`s metal era, golden 80`s synth pop era and golden 70`s rock, pop, disco and new age /ambient music era – Neon Eyes, Celestial Prophecy And Sacred Serenity, Elrond`s Gate influences: new age and ambiental music, symphonic music, score and tv music, progressive rock and metal, epic music, early electronic stuff…..Influences (Neon Eyes, Celestial Prophecy And Sacred Serenity, Elrond`s Gate): Ultravox (Midge Ure), Marillion, Saga, IQ, Arjen Lucassen, Lana Lane, Alphaville, early Nightwish, Jean Michel Jarre, Vangelis, Kitaro, Mike Oldfield, Enya, A-HA, Kraftwerk, Space, Gary Numan, Tangerine Dream, early Dimmu Borgir, Arsen Dedic, Zoran Predin, early Dismal Euphony, Bal Sagoth, early Cradle Of Filth, early Dream Theater, Savatage, early Blind Guardian, Ivanhoe, early Porcupine Tree, Blondie, Kornelije Kovac, Laza Ristovski, Gershon Kingsley, Zdravko Colic, Matia Bazar, Modern Talking, Michael Sembello, Renaissance, early Moonspell, early Amorphis, early Paradise Lost, early My Dying Bride, Death, Atheist, Cynic, early Nevermore, early And Oceans, Negura Bunget, Ancient, early Opeth, Orphaned Land, early Tiamat, Samael, Therion, Eurythmics, Jan Hammer, Rick Wakeman, Oliver Wakeman, Arena, Clive Nolan, Alice Cooper, early WASP, Kim Wilde, Irene Cara, Madonna, Shadow Gallery, Frameshift, Pink Floyd, Led Zeppelin, Uriah Heep, Colosseum, Sonata Arctica, Rhapsody, Deep Purple, ACT, Giorgio Moroder, Ennio Morricone, early The Gathering, early Morgana Lefay, Horner, Goldsmith, Hertzog, Oliver Onions, Mozart, Bach, Vivaldi, Beethoven, Chopin, Stravinski, Jeff Waine, The Sparks, Alan Parsons, Duran Duran, Spock`s Beard, early Thyrfing, Dean Martin, Sinatra, Barry de Vorzon, Magnum, Journey, Styx, Iron Maiden, early Manowar, Virgin Steele, Color Theory, Cairo, Jethro Tull, Omega, early Angra, Labyrinth, Eldritch, Empty Tremor, Introitus, Spheric Universe Experiance, Annihilator, Forbidden, Dreamscape, Andromeda and many many more…

You Tube
